A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never been so disappointed or bored in a movie before. I seriouslydon'tknowjow anyone could have enjoyed this utter garbage. The worst part is that it could have been good. It was so poorly executed\, the characters had no chemistry\, acting from some of the stars was B-movie level at best and the \"funny\" bits didn't do much for the story.\n\nThe ticket sales for this movie have dropped off by 77% after a week in cinemas. That is all you have to look at to get an idea of how bad this film is.
